com.launchdarkly.testhelpers.httptest

Class Handlers.SSE

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.launchdarkly.testhelpers.httptest.Handlers.SSE
  • Enclosing class:
    Handlers

    public abstract static class Handlers.SSE
extends java.lang.Object
    Shortcut handlers for simulating a Server-Sent Events stream.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SSE()

      Writes an SSE comment line.
      static Handler event(java.lang.String content)
      Writes an SSE event terminated by two newlines.
      static Handler event(java.lang.String message, java.lang.String data)
      Writes an SSE event created from individual fields.
      static Handler leaveOpen()
      Waits indefinitely without closing the stream.
      static Handler start()
      Starts a chunked stream with the standard content type "text/event-stream", and the charset UTF-8.

      • leaveOpen

        public static Handler leaveOpen()
        Waits indefinitely without closing the stream. Equivalent to Handlers.hang().
        Returns:
        a Handler
